title: Dijkstraâ€™s Algorithm
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Finds shortest paths from source to all nodes in weighted graph with non-negative edges. 
Repeatedly pick closest unvisited node and update answers for its neighbors.

common_mistakes.correction: Dijkstra fails with negative edges. It assumes once a node is visited, its shortest path is final. Use Bellman-Ford.

real_world_use_cases.description: Routers find fastest path for packets.
